Pore/Structural Features.Pore Size: 3.2 Å (shortest channel distance), 6.0 Å (1-D channel width)

Other Information.Test Conditions: 25 K to 60 K, up to 1000 mbar
Other Information.Additional Info: H2 uptake decreases with increasing temperature and pressure.

Other Information.Test Conditions: 25 K to 60 K, up to 1000 mbar
Other Information.Additional Info: D2 uptake increases with increasing pressure due to stronger binding affinity and partial condensation effects.

Sieving Mechanism: Size exclusion at sub-nanometer scale enhanced by kinetic quantum sieving

Experimental Validation.Method: Cryogenic thermal desorption spectroscopy, Low-pressure high-resolution volumetric gas adsorption
Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: D2/H2 selectivity: 21.6 at 25 K and 1000 mbar

Other Information.Additional Info: MOF-303 demonstrates strong binding affinity for D2 and exhibits a significant increase in D2 uptake with pressure, leading to high selectivity under industrial conditions.
